channel.title: Version 8.1 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 8.1.1 (2025-10-05) Fixes [bug] cards: restore compat wit' Cap'n Hugo 0.126.3 #1145 8.1.0 (2025-10-05) Enhancements [feature] tabs: improve a11y #1144 [feature] cards: create new card shortcode #1138 [feature][change] children: new presentat'n wit' cards #1124 Fixes [bug] history: fix checkmarks fer canonifyURLs=true #1142 [bug] version'n: use consistent language 'n german translat'n #1139 [bug] version: translat'n text fer “Version” be miss'n #1133 [bug] tabs: can’t toggle tabs wit' similar names #1132 Maintenance [task][change] linkeffects: make default externalLinkTarget behave like standard #1143 [task] alias: remove noindex #1137
